SCALE.$description: base-scale of all size-related tokens (size, space, dimension). The default is 1rem = 16(px). If you change it, it will change all size-related tokens. :)

default.$description: default weight for fonts

REM.$description: ðŸ‘€ If you change this core font size, it will change all font-related tokens.

canvas.$description: Background color for body and cropped assets backgrounds (e.g the product cards)

canvasMuted.$description: Background color for cropped assets inside cards, for example: .ProductCardImage

surfaceMedium.$description: backgroung color for surfaces, layouts and graphic elements that are on top of canvas color (e.g layout cards)

surfaceSubtle.$description: backgroung color for surfaces on top of white backgrounds, layouts and graphic elements (e.g background for cropped assets and informational containers)

surfaceOpaque.$description: backgroung color for surfaces on top of white backgrounds, layouts and graphic elements (e.g background for cropped assets and informational containers)

default.$description: Default text color, used for headlines

medium.$description: Text color in medium weight. Used for body text

subtle.$description: Text color in subtle weight. Used for low emphasis text such as labels and icons

rainbow.$description: Rainbow color for foreground elements (e.g ProgressButton-Bar)

brand.$description: Text color in brand color. Used for high emphasis elements and text such as reduced price copy and the tonies logo

brandAccent.$description: Text color in brand color. Used for high emphasis elements and text such as reduced price copy and the tonies logo

default.$description: background default color for primary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

hover.$description:
Background hover color for primary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

active.$description:
Background active color for primary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

onPrimary.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on primary background

default.$description: background default color for primary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

hover.$description:
Background hover color for primary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

active.$description:
Background active color for primary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

onPrimaryAccent.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on primary accent background

default.$description: background default color for secondary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

hover.$description:
Background hover color for secondary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

active.$description:
Background active color for secondary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

onSecondary.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on secondary background

default.$description: background default color for tertiary interactive elements (e.g buttons and .Tab)

hover.$description:
Background hover color for tertiary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

active.$description:
Background active color for tertiary interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

onTertiary.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on tertiary background

onTertiaryContrast.$description: Color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on tertiary background. The color will not change when switching modes since it is intended to work on a darker background.

onTertiaryHover.$description: Hover color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on tertiary background. For example, the text on hover on the .MenuItemText and .Tab

default.$description: background default color for tertiary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

hover.$description:
Background hover color for tertiary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

* This color references the primary defualt interaction color and adds a modifier on it to make it darker.

active.$description:
Background active color for tertiary accent interactive elements (e.g buttons)

background default color for tertiary overlay interactive elements (e.g buttons)

This color is often used as an ovelay on graphic elements like photos or other detailed assets.

hover.$description: Background hover color for tertiary overlay interactive elements (e.g buttons)

active.$description: Background active color for tertiary overlay interactive elements (e.g buttons)

onTertiaryOverlay.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on tertiary overlay background

default.$description: background color for selected elements (e.g .Tab)

hover.$description: Background hover color for selected elements

active.$description: background color for selected elements

onSelectedNeutral.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on selected background. For exmaple: .MenuItemText

hover.$description: Background hover primary color for selected elements

active.$description: Background active primary color for selected elements

onSelectedPrimary.$description: color for elements (i.e text and icons) that are placed on selected background

transparent.$description:
A composite token border system to be applied on any interactive component or element wich has a border (e.g buttons, inputs)
This is a synamic ssystem that will change according to the selected theme:
The color token is a dynamic variable but the width and style are the same across all themes.

light.$description:
A composite token border system to be applied on any layout wich has a border (e.g dividers)
This is a synamic ssystem that will change according to the selected theme
